EmailTemplate.name: PS GSL1 PRM-Request Change Partner Account Mapping of Partner User in NAM
EmailTemplate.subject: PRM-Request Change Partner Account Mapping of Partner User in NAM : {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.PS_Escalated_To_Name__c},
Please process the following Partner-related request based on the details below:
PRM-Request to Change Partner Account Mapping of Partner User in NAM
Partner User Name for Partner Account
Partner User Email for Partner Account
Wrong Account Name for Partner Account
Federation ID of the User
Correct Account Name for Partner Account
Correct ALCR ID / 1*
Correct SAP ID / 2*
Correct Account ID / 3*
Additional Notes
Once completed, please revert with the confirmation.
If additional information is needed, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at partner.support@nokia.com.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
